data.message: suing the NZ National Party for using your music on a ad..here, in NZ you should be honored mate...lots o peps liked what they heard, but prima Donna another story, means us, taxpayers got to foot the bill..just go do some navel gazing and go away... you, off our listening list mate😤

replies.message: I am a solicitor...and know more than you ever will..my post was not about the legalities of the matter on hand..so you go do some navel gazing also...oh by the way..do you put food in that mouth...
